html: 12.15.24  9:21 am   what if an album that's not an album is actually still an album?
12.15.24  9:15 am   I find it cool how distinctly recognisable each one of your songs are. How do you do it?
12.15.24  6:49 am   How do I find a good question to ask?
12.15.24  6:32 am   Any tips to avoid becoming an absolute megalomaniac after the slightest amount of success?

12.15.24  3:49 am   i tend to flip flop between knowing im too weird for most people to understand (positive), and knowing im too weird for most people to understand (negative). the latter causes me to feel a deep sadness, and then i begin to think i may never be able to relate to people, or vice versa. i know this is not true, but i always have a hard time shaking it off anyway. how do i permanently get rid of my anxieties and fully harness my weird powers?

12.15.24  2:29 am   Do you like doritos dipped in mayonnaise?

      If not, why do you like watching small puppies die?
12.15.24  12:10 am   do you ever have the urge to get on all fours and bark around like a dog in the middle of the street?
